name: Ankita!❤
greetingText: I really like your name btw!❤
wishText: 🎊May the god will always stay by your side!❤
text2: Today is the day you shine brighter than the sun! 🌞 May this year be filled with success, joy, and unforgettable memories. 🎈
text3: Here's to celebrating the amazing person you are and all the adventures that await you in the coming year!🎉❤
text4: No amount of emojis, gifs, or texts could express how grateful we are to have you in our lives. Cheers to another fantastic year, Ankita!🎂
text4Adjective: 😏You Know You Are So Much Special❤
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.❤
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.😉
